text: Khitchdee, Allahabad (India) (http://www.khitchdee.com) Khitchdee is a simple dish made of rice and lentils, cooked together with some spices in a single pot. We've named our high-tech company after this dish, and strive to be simple, useful and friendly. Our work spans music, teaching and building gadgets. We're based in a small town called Allahabad in northern India. We're looking for people who are or have been musicians, have taught at some level and are programmers or chip designers. Send us an email at rohit@khitchdee.com
